biography: Erik, a familiar face from Ruukkigolf, brings a quiet intensity to the greens of the Hector Trophée. While he may maintain a reserved demeanor off the course, his commitment to precision and strategic play is evident to all who watch him compete.

With two past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Erik has gained valuable experience in the tournament's unique blend of individual and pair formats. He has yet to capture either the coveted Hector Trophée or the Victor Trophy, but his consistent improvement suggests that he is always a contender.

Although Erik is not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, his passion for the game and dedication to honing his skills leave the door open for a possible return to the competition in the future.
